author: veithen
msg: AXIS2-3290: Changed the POMs so that maven.test.skip=true can be used and has the expected effect of skipping test compilation (including execution of any ant scripts related to tests) and test execution.
Skipping the ant executions is achieved by using <tasks unless="maven.test.skip">, a feature that was introduced in version 1.2 of the antrun plugin.
